results.title: 11 Ways To Say 'How Are You?' In German - Emma Loves German
results.content: Wiegehtes dir? is the informal version, so you can use this on anyone you would normally speak informally with; friends, family, younger people etc. How to Respond If someone asks youwiegehtes dir? the correct way to respond would be to say: ... Top tip: Note that when asking 'how are you?' in German, the pronoun is in the dative case ...

results.title: How To Say How Are You In German (And Respond)
results.content: Learn different ways to ask and answer how someone is in German, from informal to formal situations. Find out how to usewiegeht's, alles gut, was macht die Arbeit and more.

results.title: How to Use Wie Geht's and How to Respond - Discover Discomfort
results.content: Wiegeht'sis a common way to say "how are you" in German, but it requires an answer and a follow-up question. Learn the alternatives, the regional variations and the polite ways to respond toWiegeht's.

results.title: WIE GEHT'S? Definition & Meaning - Merriam-Webster
results.content: The meaning ofWIEGEHT'S? is how goes it? : how is it going? —used as a greeting.

results.title: Responding To 'Wie Geht's?' In German | German Language Blog
results.content: Responding To'WieGeht's?'In German Posted by Constanze on Oct 12, 2021 in Language, Vocabulary Guten Tag!Wiegeht's? In my last post, we looked at alternative ways of saying this phrase, which means 'How are you?' in German.
